ESM_HWAttrs_t Struct Reference
ESM Driver Internal Data Structures

ESM Hardware Atrributes. More...

#include <drivers/esm/include/esm_internal.h>

Data Fields

volatile uint32_t baseAddr
 
uint32_t highPrioIntNum
 
uint32_t lowPrioIntNum
 

Detailed Description

ESM Hardware Atrributes.

The structure is used to store the hardware specific configuration which is passed to the driver instance

ESM parameters are used with the ESM_init() call.

Field Documentation

volatile uint32_t ESM_HWAttrs_t::baseAddr

ESM Peripheral's base address for the control register space

uint32_t ESM_HWAttrs_t::highPrioIntNum

ESM Peripheral's interrupt vector for high priority line

uint32_t ESM_HWAttrs_t::lowPrioIntNum

ESM Peripheral's interrupt vector for low priority line
